description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+24 vs AC; 3d6+7 damage, and the target is slowed until the end of Dawnwing's next turn. If the target is already slowed, it is immobilized instead. If the target is already immobilized, it is unconscious instead.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+24 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage, and the target is slowed until the end of Dawnwing's next turn.

At-Will

Standard

Dawnwing makes two claw attacks and a bite attack. If a claw attack hits an immobilized target, the target is dazed until the end of Dawnwing's next turn

At-Will ✦ Fire

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When dawnwing is hit by a creature adjacent to him, at-will

+22 vs Fortitude; the target is pushed 5 squares and takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). The target can make a saving throw against this effect only if it doesn't move on its turn.

At-Will ✦ Charm, Gaze

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Ranged 10

+22 vs Will; the target slides 3 squares and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of Dawnwing's next turn. This attack doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

Psychic

Minor, Recharges When First Bloodied

Ranged 10

Trigger: When first bloodied

Targets a conjuration, zone, or effect that a save can end; +23 vs Will; (of the creator of the conjuration, zone, or effect; the conjuration, zone, or effect ends, and its creator takes )2d10+6 psychic damage.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+22 vs Reflex; 3d6+8 fire damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). Miss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of Dawnwing's next turn.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Grasping breath recharges, and Dawnwing uses it

Encounter ✦ Charm

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +22 vs Will; the target slides 5 squares and is stunned until the end of Dawnwing's next turn. Aftereffect: The target grants combat advantage (save ends).
Dawnwing makes a saving throw against one stunned or dazed conditions at the start of his turn.

HP 724; Bloodied 362 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 20 fire 		Init +9 | AP 2 | Save +5; see also clear mind
AC 33Fort 32Ref 30Will 31
Speed 8, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 25 (+16)
Con 21 (+14)		Dex 10 (+9)
Int 20 (+14)		Wis 19 (+13)
Cha 22 (+15)
Languages Common, Draconic, Elven, Goblin
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +19, Insight +18, Intimidate +20Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 28
